APP.AUTH.LOGIN.ALERT.ADVANTAGE_INFO.MSG: A user account on our page enables you to share your own configuration snippets. It also allows us to give additional permissions to users (moderative abilities). To be an active member of our community, you should definitely have an account and share your own snippets!

APP.ENTRIES.FORM.ALTTEXT.APPLICATION.HIN: What is the name of the application you want to share a configuration snippet for? In case of an Apache Tomcat webserver snippet, you should use 'tomcat' here.
APP.ENTRIES.FORM.ALTTEXT.ORGANIZATION.HI: Which organization builds the application you want to paste a snippet for? If you would like to share a snippet for the Apache Tomcat webserver for example, you could use either 'apache' or the reverse URL 'org.apache'.
APP.ENTRIES.FORM.ALTTEXT.SCOPE.HINT: The scope of a configuration should contain the version of the application (e.g. 'v1'). Additionally, it may contain the name of the configuration file in question, if multiple of these files exist for the application. The structure should be '(version)[.component]', e.g. 'v7.server.xml' for a Tomcat 7 server.xml configuration file.
APP.ENTRIES.FORM.ALTTEXT.SLUG.HINT: The slug is the last part of the unique identifier of a snippet. Normally it is automatically generated from the snippet title, but in case it is already used or you simply want to define your own slug, you can do so by enabling the input field.
APP.ENTRIES.FORM.ALTTEXT.SLUG.MANUALLY: By enabling this input field, you can define the slug yourself.

APP.GLOBAL.TITLE: ElektraInitiative
APP.HOME.HEADLINE.HOWITWORKS: Want to see how it works?
APP.HOME.HEADLINE.SLOGAN.SECOND: Elektra - the configuration framework for everyone
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.1.DETAILS: Elektra stores configuration in a global, hierarchical key database. Mount configuration files into the hierarchy, override single configuration parameters or use profiles. KDB provides easy access.
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.1.HEADLINE: Global configuration database
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.2.DETAILS: All common and important configuration formats are supported through various storage plugins: XML, JSON, INI or even special configuration files like /etc/hosts.
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.2.HEADLINE: Human readable configuration files
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.3.DETAILS: Nearly all functionality of Elektra is implemented in plugins and tools which can be combined to powerful functionality.
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.3.HEADLINE: Extendable through plugins and tools
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.4.DETAILS: Automate configuration tasks with powerful tools, surf through configuration with GUIs, and notify other applications about configuration changes.
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.4.HEADLINE: Batteries included
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.5.DETAILS: Validate configuration immediately on changes, eliminate your configuration duplicates with the help of symbolic links or compute configuration parameters from other configuration values.
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.5.HEADLINE: Configuration specification
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.6.DETAILS: Utilize Elektra's code generator to generate type-safe configuration access code based on the same specification as used for validation.
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.6.HEADLINE: Code generation
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.1.DETAILS: You need help in developing a custom plugin? Check out the plugin tutorial!
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.1.HEADLINE: Develop custom plugin
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.2.DETAILS: Of course you can use Elektra also outside a C or C++ environment. Have a look at our language bindings!
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.2.HEADLINE: Use Elektra outside C/C++
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.3.DETAILS: Of course we can! An initiative like Elektra asks periodically for decisions! We welcome everyone to join the discussions!
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.3.HEADLINE: Can you elaborate on the Why?
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.4.DETAILS: This website does not only contain the news and documentation around Elektra. It does also comprise a service that allows for sharing, searching, converting and downloading of configuration snippets in various formats. To search for a snippet, use the search bar at the top of the page. Uploading new snippets requires an account, which you can register here.
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.4.HEADLINE: Sharing of Configuration Snippets
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.5.DETAILS: An important step in utilizing all of Elektras features is the elektrification of your application. We have written a tutorial for you that explains how to do that!
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.5.HEADLINE: Elektrify your Application
APP.HOME.LABEL.TOOL.OTHERS.DETAILS: Also other applications like the KDE KolorManager already use Elektra and its awesome features!
APP.HOME.LABEL.TOOL.OTHERS.HEADLINE: Other Applications
APP.HOME.LABEL.TOOL.QTGUI.DETAILS: Elektra offers a GUI based on Qt Quick. It simplifies common tasks and offers easy access to the key database itself. A description for the GUI tool can be found here.
APP.HOME.LABEL.TOOL.QTGUI.HEADLINE: Graphical User Interface
APP.HOME.LABEL.TOOL.WEBGUI.DETAILS: The Web GUI allows for remote configuration of systems. Besides the configuration of single systems, it also features cluster configuration.
APP.HOME.LABEL.TOOL.WEBGUI.HEADLINE: Web GUI
